entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Don't you get your business didn't become part of the gov't on election, that the Trump Org doesn't get to use gov't money as part it's operating budget? You need a new cognitive test! Please, at your next press meet, spell the word 'CORRUPTION!' INCOMING!
https://t.co/meG44NrlQ5
